import moment from 'moment'; export const UploadProgress = ({ progress, mediaResources }) => { const validateFileType = (fileItem) => { console.log('File',fileItem) var fileType = fileItem.type; // image/png image/jpeg var rootType = fileType.split("/")[0]; switch (rootType) { case "image": return 'File'; default: return 'Video'; } } return(
{mediaResources && mediaResources.length && mediaResources.map( resource => ())}
Library
{" "}
Filename Type Status Date
{resource.name}
{validateFileType(resource)}
{progress }%

); }
